page.title: 16FARMING
page.content:
THE ENTIRE BLOCK IS MOSTLY ARABLE FARMING. THERE WAS A PIG FARM UNTIL THIS SUMMER WHEN THE OWNER MOVED TO THE ISLE OF SKYE. MATTHEW TURKEY FARMS TAKE UP A GOOD PORTION OF THE OLD WARTIME AIRSTRIP AT BEESTON AND AT DUNHAM THERE WAS A DAIRY FARM SELLING DAIRY PRODUCE BUT THIS ALSO CLOSED THIS AUTUMN DUE TO THE OWNER MOVING FOR HEALTH REASONS.
THE FIRST HALF OF THE YEAR WAS EXTREMELY WET AND HARVEST WAS DIFFICULT AND LATE, GRAIN STARTING TO GROW AGAIN BEFORE CUT, BUT THE LATER MONTHS HAVE BEEN VERY DRY AND THE GROUND HAS BECOME VERY HARD AND ROOT CROPS DIFFICULT TO LIFT.
